title: Ivanti Unified Endpoint Management
descriptionMarkdown: The [Ivanti Unified Endpoint Management](https://www.ivanti.com/products/unified-endpoint-manager) data connector provides the capability to ingest [Ivanti UEM Alerts](https://help.ivanti.com/ld/help/en_US/LDMS/11.0/Windows/alert-c-monitoring-overview.htm) into Microsoft Sentinel.
additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**IvantiUEMEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-ivantiuem-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

sampleQueries.query:
IvantiUEMEvent
 | summarize count() by tostring(SrcHostname)
 | top 10 by count_

dataTypes.name: Syslog (IvantiUEMEvent)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
IvantiUEMEvent
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
IvantiUEMEvent
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**IvantiUEMEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-ivantiuem-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.
>**NOTE:** This data connector has been developed using Ivanti Unified Endpoint Management Release 2021.1 Version 11.0.3.374

instructionSteps.title: 1. Install and onboard the agent for Linux or Windows
instructionSteps.description:
Install the agent on the Server where the Ivanti Unified Endpoint Management Alerts are forwarded.

> Logs from Ivanti Unified Endpoint Management Server deployed on Linux or Windows servers are collected by **Linux** or **Windows** agents.

parameters.title: Choose where to install the Linux agent:

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on Azure Linux Virtual Machine
instructionSteps.description: Select the machine to install the agent on and then click **Connect**.

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on a non-Azure Linux Machine
instructionSteps.description: Download the agent on the relevant machine and follow the instructions.

parameters.title: Choose where to install the Windows agent:

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on Azure Windows Virtual Machine
instructionSteps.description: Select the machine to install the agent on and then click **Connect**.

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on a non-Azure Windows Machine
instructionSteps.description: Download the agent on the relevant machine and follow the instructions.

instructionSteps.title: 2. Configure Ivanti Unified Endpoint Management alert forwarding.
instructionSteps.description: [Follow the instructions](https://help.ivanti.com/ld/help/en_US/LDMS/11.0/Windows/alert-t-define-action.htm) to set up Alert Actions to send logs to syslog server.
